forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 10C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 51F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clearing skies after some evening rain. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Clearing late. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunder possible. High 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Thunder possible. High 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Thunder possible. Low 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Thunder possible. Low 37F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms likely in the morning. Then the chance of scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms likely in the morning. Then the chance of scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 2C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 36F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 14C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 56F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
